column4: Crazy question people. Is there a way I can send a visual message to the person logged into this particular terminal? I am in thgrough ssh. And yeah, I have root, its my machine.
For you info, I am in the midst of the google phase, so yeah, I am using the cow powers.
wall? ty I shall start my quest there.
maybe move all Desktop files to folder, make a text file on Desktop, and kill the app the user is using so they will see the Desktop
